item.title: Cloud Environment Variables
item.description: Environment variables are dynamic values that can be accessed by processes running on an operating system, including programs, scripts, and command-line interfaces. These variables contain information about the operating system environment and can be used to pass data to programs, control the behavior of the system, and provide configuration settings.
